title: The Karthus Show (Mordor Edition)

embed.description: A One Champ Show to tilt them all, tons of skill include... Or something... Musics: Concept of love ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4V4IEV8l-gA Waluigi Pinball / Wario Stadium by JoshhMarshh ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7UrlNJ5MXW4&t Infiltration ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=40fZZ-MZZ4A Fast Metal ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t4sFqWM3KYw Gourmet Race by ZeroJanitor ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BVDw_uiYU6M Dire dire docks by AJ DiSpirito ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bi2Hb1JHzvc

body:
Hi everyone,

I share with you this video, which is my first ever made! I want to begin a "series" like that with funny moment around one champ, Karthus in this one (wow, damn you're smart !) and to improve myself, I would REALLY love to hear what you guys think about it, then any feedback is appreciated ! Actually i try to do something entertaining, something pleasant to look. Anyway, i'm waiting you !

Thank you !

replies.body: Nice skills... How do you do bits like at 2:09?
Thanks ! Actually i did each part of it on GIMP (yeah, too mainstream to use Photoshop :P), the 4 kinds of score and the background
